sentences.en: A short stubby hand argues a lack of sensibility.
sentences.cn: 手指短而粗硬被认为缺少灵活性.

sentences.en: Capped column snowflake ^ These crystals first grow into stubby columns.
sentences.cn: 冠柱状雪花:这些晶体首先长成短柱形.

sentences.en: He nodded and puffed on a stubby pipe as he listened.
sentences.cn: 他边听边点头，还吸着一支粗短的烟斗。

sentences.en: He pointed a stubby finger at a wooden chair opposite him.
sentences.cn: 他伸出一根粗短的手指指向他对面的一把木椅。

sentences.en: He spoke words slowly, thrusting a stubby finger toward his face.
sentences.cn: 他慢条斯理地吐着一字一句, 一边伸出一只短粗的指头对着他的脸戳戳.

sentences.en: Pug rubbed a hand over his grimy stubby face.
sentences.cn: 帕格伸手摸了摸他那肮脏的、胡子拉茬的脸.

sentences.en: The bill of the bird in the photograph is short and stubby.
The mathematician , Yurchenko , was a stubby , phlegmatic , shrewd person.
sentences.cn: 数学教师 尤尔钦科 是个矮胖的, 冷漠而机灵的人.

sentences.en: Two of his stubby fingers was waggling playfully into Yossarian's face.
sentences.cn: 他的两个又粗又短的手指对着尤索林的脸开玩笑地乱摇晃.

words.tran_cn: 短而硬的；断株样的；短而粗的

trans.tran_cn: 矮胖啤酒瓶（容量通常为0.375升）,男式短裤
